thread.title: De Villiers’ broken jaw surgery successful
thread.title_full: De Villiers’ broken jaw surgery successful | Sports | Saudi Gazette

author: saudigazette.com.sa
title: De Villiers’ broken jaw surgery successful
text: CAPE TOWN — South Africa captain Jean de Villiers had surgery on a broken jaw Wednesday and was discharged within hours, officials said. De Villiers returned home form the Rugby World Cup Monday after breaking his jaw in the Springboks’ 46-6 victory over Samoa Saturday. It was the latest in a series of injury setbacks for the 34-year-old center, who has since announced his retirement from test rugby. It went well with the operation. He had his wisdom teeth removed and a plate inserted in the jaw,” Springboks doctor Craig Roberts said. De Villiers said he hoped to return to England within a fortnight to support his teammates at the tournament. — Reuters
